org.turkudragons.SpaceHunter

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.turkudragons.SpaceHunter.Collider
      • org.turkudragons.SpaceHunter.Character
        • org.turkudragons.SpaceHunter.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Active, Visible

    public class Player
extends Character
implements Active, Visible
    Controllable player on the screen that will be saved oList index 0.
    Author:
    Pasi(main functionality, documentation), Tommi(animations), Santeri (collect, mouse, input)

        public void update(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> o,
                   Map m,
                   int delta)
        updates the player on the playground. Super.update-has all the kinematics and common stuff with character and then we add also pull item and powerups here.

        Parameters:
